attributes.action: Ban the political use of the word spin and make politicians use the correct term "lying"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Spin is the practice of manipulating figures to appear better than they are or deliberately presenting facts in a misleading way.
It implies that we, the general public, are too stupid to form an opinion if presented with the plain facts.
The use of advertising agency style psychology in politics is a deplorable practice and should be banned immediately.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
